pages.text: $(li)The Flint and Steel is a tool that allows you to produce fire.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are holding the Flint and Steel in your hand.
$(li)You can use it to activate the $(l:patchouli:perks/nether_portal)Nether Portal$(/l).$(br)$(li)Be careful, if you or other creature touch the fire, it will start to burn.
